short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annotate Dominion cards with desired properties!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Often times, we want to quickly have a look at what the Dominion cards for a specific game are for. This extensions helps us (and the impatient) with that by allowing you to filter the cards during a game of Dominion.

Some of us just love trashing cards, okay! 

This is open-source and the code can be found here: https://github.com/kumar-ish/dominion-annotator
